summary: This is an email chain from August 19, 2019, forwarding a request for subpoenas to obtain Jeffrey Epstein's death certificate from the NYC Office of Vital Records and his autopsy report from the NYC Office of Chief Medical Examiner, in order to close out his case. The request is made by a Supervisory Deputy U.S. Marshal from the Southern District of New York.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.role: Deceased individual whose case is being closed
persons.context: The subject of the requested death certificate and autopsy report; his case is being closed out.

persons.name: Supervisory Deputy U.S. Marshal Southern District of New York
persons.context: The official who needs subpoenas to obtain Epstein's death certificate and autopsy report, using their information for the return.

events.title: Request for Subpoenas for Epstein Death Documents
events.description: A Supervisory Deputy U.S. Marshal from the Southern District of New York requests subpoenas to obtain Jeffrey Epstein's death certificate and autopsy report to close his case.
personsInvolved: Supervisory Deputy U.S. Marshal Southern District of New York

locations: New York City Department of Health and Mental Hygiene, Office Of Vital Records Bureau of Vital Statistics
New York City Office of Chief Medical Examiner
keyFacts: On August 19, 2019, a law enforcement official requested subpoenas to obtain Jeffrey Epstein's death certificate and autopsy report.
The purpose was to close out Jeffrey Epstein's case.
The requested documents were to come from New York City agencies: the Office of Vital Records and the Office of Chief Medical Examiner.
